Reviews.Title: “Good Location & Well Maintained”
Reviews.Author: OldManWanderer
Reviews.Content: am wyndam owner reserved 1 br deluxe unit weekend october 2011 attend josh concert shared timeshare rental property wyndam half facility unit maintained roomy master jaccuzi tub comfortable king sized bed kitchen dining living balcony table 4 chairs

Reviews.Title: “Stay at your own risk”
Reviews.Author: jeffmullen
Reviews.Content: wyndham owner surprises restrictions resort treated thief time called operator tell check dishwashing detergent packs seven days towels check towels wednesdays five days vacation play tennis ping pong game equipment drivers license wont play game located swimming resorts security code charge drinks equipment whatever carrying wallet swimming sucks wont resort

Reviews.Title: “Great resort to relax at after doing Orlando attractions”
Reviews.Author: mom2kgirls
Reviews.Content: stayed resort 3 times spring summer teenagers loved location near attractions set road lake cecile secluded heron nest following month baby following mother chance enjoy nature middle tourist offer variety activities beach watersports pool games music game family night activities comfortable letting kids roam own time enjoyed independence spa special truly relaxed pampered visited local attractions universal enjoyed coming relaxing atmosphere resort staff fabulous extra chairs bedding towels brought immediately 1am front desk suggestions directions answered questions politely booking resort 4 people chose deluxe king bed pullout sofa bigger nicer kitchen balcony units 2 beds bedroom kitchenette kids chose pullout overall unit bed bedroom nice extra space balcony especially relaxing

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly Surprised”
Reviews.Author: bobmmp
Reviews.Content: returned week trip stayed stayed star island property read reviews pleasantly surprised resort wyndham owners available short notice booked weeks unit bedroom deluxe spacious clean located 5 floor view bed comfortable kitchen size cooking utilities pots pans fitness top notch pool poolside bar pleasant surprise prices bar reasonable staff throughout plenty near eat fast food fine dining bottom line stay resort rating
